Description: Fragment probably of lid of East Greek pottery vessel. Underside reserved. Upper surface slipped cream; from centre: broken maeander band: band with added red band lined in white; wavy line; two bands; frieze perhaps of alternating chequerboard and florals (red on alternate leaves, dot rosette in field).
Bibliographic references: Price 1924 / Pottery of Naukratis (pl. VIII, no. 3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1043)
